trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的组件编辑器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>或相似的控件。

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object that is embedded in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: HotSpotCollectionEditor 类提供一个用户界面以进行编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>中嵌入的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>或相似的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: HotSpotCollectionEditor 调用通过选择省略号按钮 (**...**) 上**热点**属性在可视化设计器的**属性**网格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>方法始终返回`false`以指示可以在编辑器中的一次选择该只有一个对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>方法返回的编辑器可以创建的类型数组。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A> property returns the name of the Help topic that the editor displays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>属性返回编辑器将显示的帮助主题的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> class when you select the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid, when designing an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>类的新实例，当选择省略号按钮 (**...**) 上**热点**属性在可视化设计器的**属性**网格中，在设计时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控件或其他控件，用于封装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The type of the collection to edit.
Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> collection elements can be selected at one time.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否多个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>可以一次选择集合元素。

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: CanSelectMultipleInstances 方法始终返回`false`; 因此，只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>对象可以在中的一次选择<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Gets the multiple data types that the collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合编辑器可以创建多个数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The types that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object can create are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>, and others that can be derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: 类型的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>创建对象可以是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>，和可以从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>中派生的其他</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: 数据类型的类型数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref>可以创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help topic to display for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取要显示的帮助主题<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The HelpTopic property gets the name of the Help topic to display when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> dialog box **Help** button is clicked or when the **F1** key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: HelpTopic 属性获取的名称时要显示的帮助主题的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>对话框**帮助**单击按钮时，或者当**F1**按下键。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the Help topic to display.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定要显示的帮助主题。
